name: Outer Docklands
role_in_state: Primary commercial port and repair hub
economy_niches: ritual-augury services for pilots and merchants
coastal trade brokerage and freight handling
culture_adjustments: higher transient/crew population; weaker kin-track permanence
market-law and brokering override local kin arbitration
artisan-runic guilds control major craft and slips
boat-name rites shortened for commercial turnover
multilingual trade pidgin from visiting crews
constraints: scarce imported ritual reagents raise service costs
limited fresh water and landfill space for expansion
state/guild licensing tightly limits slip allocation
notes: central node for state coastal trade and augury revenue
salt pans and major slips largely guild-controlled
rapid timber rot and metal corrosion shorten vessel lifespans
